keys.string: Hey, [NAME]! What brings you at this hour?
The gourmet coffee? Oh yeah! That’s my new secret weapon to staying up through the nights and class!
Ah! I understand! Sorry to ask you, but I appreciate you coming back still!
Thanks! I really appreciate it! Now let’s get started!
Danny hands me a bag of gourmet. Item aquired: Gourmet Coffee

ArrayOfString.string: [Danny][Dialog]Hey, [NAME]! What brings you at this hour?
[Danny][Dialog]The gourmet coffee? Oh yeah! That’s my new secret weapon to staying up through the nights and class!
[Danny][Option]You want some? I dunno… This stuff cost a pretty penny. How about this? Help me out with my homework, and I’ll give you some of my [GOURMET COFFEE]! What do you say?
[Danny][Dialog]Ah! I understand! Sorry to ask you, but I appreciate you coming back still!
[Danny][Dialog]Thanks! I really appreciate it! Now let’s get started!
[Narrator][Dialog]Danny hands me a bag of gourmet. Item aquired: Gourmet Coffee
